pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cool-retro-term is a terminal emulator which mimics the look and feel of old cathode ray tube screens. It has been designed to be eye-candy, customizable, and reasonably lightweight. It uses the konsole engine which is powerful and mature. This terminal emulator requires Qt 5.2 or higher to run.

maintainer.name: Tamás Gérczei
maintainer.description: This lame ebuild is provided as-is and exists only to extend availability to Gentoo.
